title: Sodomy Soldiers - Religion & Guns (2007)
description:
Sodomy Soldiers great E.P. Religion & Guns from 2007.
Really good punkrock for fans of Rancid and Dropkick Murphys.
The first fullength-record is on it's way and will be out in early 2009.

1. Intro 
2. How the hell 
3. When I hit the ground 
4. Religion & guns 
5. To much for anyone 
6. B.F.Y.O.T 
7. Underground Hero 
8. Nasty Kiss 
9. Russian Roulette
